price: Asaa Mola wetu Mlezi akatubadilishia lilio bora kuliko hili. Hakika sisi ni wenye kurejea kwa Mola wetu Mlezi.
arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ
footnotes: Asaa Mola wetu Mlezi akatupa badala lilio bora kuliko hili shamba letu. Hakika sisi tunamtaka Mola wetu Mlezi peke yake atupe msamaha na malipo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ʿasā rabbunā an yub'dilanā khayran min'hā innā ilā rabbinā rāghibūna
